get.summary: Get the life insurance quote based on the date of birth and sex.

parameters.name: dob
parameters.description: The date of birth in the format yyyy-MM-dd.

parameters.name: sex
parameters.description: The sex of the individual, either 'male' or 'female'.

400.description: Bad Request, missing or invalid parameters.

403.description: Forbidden, invalid or missing API token.

500.description: Internal Server Error if an unexpected error occurs.

ApiKey.description: API Token needed to access the endpoints. Type "thePowerOfFRIENDSHIP"
ApiKey.name: X-API-TOKEN
